name: Sub Zero
title: The Grandmaster of Ice
subtitle: A legendary warrior who commands the power of ice and frost
lore: As the leader of the Lin Kuei clan, Sub Zero has mastered the art of cryomancy, wielding ice with deadly precision. His control over frost allows him to immobilize enemies and create treacherous battlefields. Though his powers may seem cold, his dedication to protecting the realm burns with unwavering intensity.

passive.name: Freezing Ground
passive.description: Sub Zero transforms the ground around him into ice. In this zone, his movement speed is increased by [+20%], and his roots last [0.5s] longer.

Q.name: Ice Bolt
Q.description: Sub Zero fires an ice ball in the targeted direction, which can pass through the first enemy it hits. All enemies hit are rooted for [1.5s]. This ability deals [50/110/185/265/305] damage.

W.name: Ice Skate
W.description: Sub Zero slides in the targeted direction.

E.name: Freeze Bomb
E.description: Sub Zero shoots a circular ice ball. Upon reactivation, the ball explodes, dealing [120/290/395/525/750] damage to all hit enemies and rooting them for [1.5s]. Additionally, if it hits a rooted enemy, it deals bonus damage of [40/90/265/405/550].

R.name: Below Zero
R.description: Sub Zero slams the ground, rooting all enemies around him for [1.5s] and dealing [400/630/730] damage to them.

1.name: Piercing Ice
1.description: Sub Zero's Ice Bolt passes through one more additional enemy.

1.name: Frost Shield
1.description: After using the Ice Skate ability, Sub Zero gains a shield [65/180/250/470/560].

1.name: Expanding Frost
1.description: Freeze Bomb has slightly increased radius.

5.name: Swift Frost
5.description: Sub Zero's Freezing Ground passive increases movement speed by an additional [25%].

5.name: Mana Master
5.description: Sub Zero's maximum mana increases by [700], but his abilities cost [15] more mana.

5.name: Extended Reach
5.description: Sub Zero's abilities have slightly increased range.

10.name: Deep Freeze
10.description: The root duration of Sub Zero's Below Zero increases from [1.5s] to [2s].

10.name: Arctic Blast
10.description: Below Zero range is slightly increased.

15.name: Ice Armor
15.description: Sub Zero takes [10%] less magic damage.

15.name: Reinforced Slide
15.description: Sub Zero gains bonus [460/715] shield when using W.

15.name: Chain Reaction
15.description: Hitting multiple targets with E increases the damage by [80/180] per enemy.

20.name: Magic Breaker
20.description: Sub Zero's R breaks the enemies' magic shield for [3s].

20.name: Frozen Vulnerability
20.description: Rooted targets take [15%] more damage from Sub Zero, however roots last [0.5s] shorter.

20.name: Ice Barrier
20.description: Item (3 stacks): Upon activation, Sub Zero gains [590] shield for [2s]. [10s cd/charge 100s recharge time]

20.name: Absolute Zero
20.description: All of Sub Zero's abilities deal [15%] more damage, but his movement speed is reduced by [20%].

strengths: Strong crowd control with multiple roots
Good area control with Freezing Ground
Effective at setting up team fights
weaknesses: Vulnerable when abilities are on cooldown
